participant_1.name: Jake Thompson
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, Jake is always looking for new challenges on his skateboard.
participant_1.background: my favourite skater is rob dryden. i've a broken arm. i am a skateboarder. my friends are all skateboarders. i'm always wearing a hat.

participant_2.name: Emily Johnson
participant_2.personality: Cheerful and imaginative, Emily loves to express herself through singing and playing.
participant_2.background: i'm in the third grade. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground.
